entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Fog at times. Wind becoming north 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 12:06 AM CDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind north 30 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 12:06 AM CDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 13.
